Uses of Class
net.tinyos.prowler.Display

  • Packages that use Display 
    Package Description
    net.tinyos.prowler  
    net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting  

    • Uses of Display in net.tinyos.prowler

      Methods in net.tinyos.prowler with parameters of type Display 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TestBroadcastNode.display(Display disp)
      Draws a filled circle, which is:
      - blue if the node is sending a message
      - red if the node received a corrupted message
      - green if the node received a message without problems
      - pink if the node sent a message
      - and black as a default
      It also draws a line between mote and its parent, which is another mote who sent the message first to this.
      void Simulator.display(Display disp)
      Called by the Display whenever it is repainted, it calls the Node.display(net.tinyos.prowler.Display) method on every nodes in its Node list.
      void SelforganizingBackbones.display(Display disp) 
      void Node.display(Display disp)
      The default implementation of the display function, calls the display funtions of the member applications.
      void Application.display(Display disp)
      Every application has the ability to display its status, though it is not constrained in any way.

    • Uses of Display in net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting

      Methods in net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting with parameters of type Display 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FloodRouting.display(Display disp)
      This calls the display method for all the linked RoutingApplications.
